item.title: [DISTRELEC-5980] Basic configuration overlay issues
item.description:
Issues

  1. CZ: Only english is available and preselected as language. If the save-button is hit you run into a 500error.
  2. HU, RO, SK: The fields for language and channel are greyed out.

See screenshots.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
This is normal because of the redirect URL.

I will remove the redirect URLs on the test system.
On Czech test the language english is still selectable and if done then you run into 500 error. Please deactivate english language as it will not be supported, thx.
fixed. You can test it already on Q

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5966] Can't order at test.distrelec.ro
item.description:
You cannot put product in the basket. Button is greyed out.

  • RO(Not working): http://test.distrelec.ro/ro/LED-spotlight-warm-whiteLEDs-Signal-Construct-QMFS306H542L075/p/11026966
  • SK(working): http://test.distrelec.sk/sk/LED-spotlight-warm-whiteLEDs-Signal-Construct-QMFS306H542L075/p/11026966

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Please check, thx.

why check? because sk is working and ro not?

http://test.distrelec.ro/ro/Test-lead-%C3%B8-4-mm-red-100-cm-0-75-mm%C2%B2-CAT-I-Multi-Contact-SML-100CM-RED/p/14022002 is also not working. dont understand the sense of checking the product on another country.

Investigating...
base.js is not loaded for product detail page.
So no Javascript is working in this page.

is that the reason, that the cart don't showing?

look at:
http://test.distrelec.ro/cart

There is a problem with the footer in RO.
The module "print-footer" is not loaded

After investigation with Jan Widmer | Namics, we couldn't find any solution from the FE.

the page in Romania suddenly gets cutted.
See the source code, at the very bottom of the page:

view-source:http://test.distrelec.ro/ro/Test-lead-%C3%B8-4-mm-red-100-cm-0-75-mm%C2%B2-CAT-I-Multi-Contact-SML-100CM-RED/p/14022002
is this related to http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5987 ?
I've tried with different products, and for each product, the page breaks in a different point
fixed. Can be tested on Q already

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6001] Movex // Order export issue
item.description:
The orders will be written, splitted into the directories RO/HU/SK/CZ.
All orders should be written into AT.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The movex export cron job looks for MovexOrders that have the division 002. Since we have the same division number for AT, CZ, HU, RO and SK, then the each export job for these countries will take all new orders. Thus, this explain why we have AT orders splitted between all countries exports.

Solution: I added the movex transaction type as search filter because each country has its own transaction type, see the list below:

  • AT: I20
  • HU: I21
  • RO: I22
  • CZ: I23
  • SK: I24

attachment.name: 2014-12-11 11_17_55-Explorer_ Florian Bühler@hybris.datwyler.biz_master_ Order - hybris Management C.jpg
attachment.author: fbuehler

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5994] Optivo: Lists and Mandate API keys for HU, CZ and SK (use EXP for RO).

CZ - Mandanten-ID: 54960521352
Newsletter.CZ: 58358197019

SK - Mandanten-ID: 54960521515

item.summary: Optivo: Lists and Mandate API keys for HU, CZ and SK (use EXP for RO).

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Angel,

what is the "optIn ProcessId" for each country ?

  • The Mandanten-ID: the client ID ?
  • Newsletter ID: the Recipient List ID ?

Hi Nabil,

I updated the description with the missing values from optivo-backend.

For your understanding:

  • mandant-id = client id
  • newsletter-id = recipient list id

BR, Rafael
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5993] Incorrect "wtTeaserTrackingId" for Eastern Countries
item.description:
The parameter "wtTeaserTrackingId" is not correct for the eastern countries.

It must start with the ISO code of the country of the webshop.
Currently it is always referring to AT.

In the screenshots you can find the Product display, and the Add to cart webtrekk actions.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please fix.

Screenshots (Sorry I don't know why I can't add them here...)

http://snag.gy/UEFAE.jpg
http://snag.gy/vpXN9.jpg

Hi Ruben,

The fix has been checked in and you can test it after next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5847] 360 Degree // Change Icon and change position
item.description:
Could you please replace the current 360 Degree (see screenshot) icon with the attached one.

Change the position of the 360 Degree medias to the second position after the primary image of the product.

The order should be:
1. Primary Image
2. 360 Degree Image
4. Secondary Image
5. ...
6. Video 1
7. Video 2

item.summary: 360 Degree // Change Icon and change position

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

Thanks
